description: Try our easy to follow Ice-cream puddings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ice-cream puddings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease 6 x 2/3 cups capacity small bowls. Line with plastic wrap. Slightly soften ice-cream. Working quickly, gently stir in crumbled Christmas cake or Christmas pudding and brandy or your favourite liqueur. Spoon into prepared bowls. Cover tops with plastic wrap and freeze for at least a few hours or overnight.
When ready to serve, melt white chocolate melts in a heatproof bowl over simmering water until smooth. Remove bowl with chocolate from heat and cool slightly.
Dip pudding bowls into the hot water and unmould onto serving plates. Spoon over melted white chocolate and decorate with a sprig of holly.
